mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TSB_COST_ANALYSIS_BILL ( FID, FBILL_DATE, FROUTE, FSUPPLIER_ID, FGOODS_ID, FGOODS_SPEC_ID, FGOODS_UINT_ID, FDELIVERY_PLACE, FRECEIPT_PLACE, FFACTORY_PRICE, FCREATE_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FUPDATE_TIME, FORG_ID, FACC_ID, FPURCHASE ) SELECT REPLACE(UUID(), '-', ''), NOW() AS FBILL_DATE, A.FROUTE, B.FSUPPLIER_ID, B.FGOODS_ID, B.FGOOD_SPEC_ID, D.FUNIT_ID AS FGOOD_FUNIT_ID, A.FDELIVERY_PLACE, A.FRECEIPT_PLACE, CONVERT( IFNULL(B.FDELIVERY_PRICE, 0) / IFNULL(E.FSCALE, 0), DECIMAL ) AS FFACTORY_PRICE, B.FCREATE_TIME, B.FCREATOR_ID, B.FUPDATE_TIME, B.FORG_ID, B.FACC_ID, 1 FROM TSB_TRANSPORT_ROUTE A, TSB_PURCHASE_PRICE B, TBD_GOODS D, TBD_UNIT E WHERE A.`FDELIVERY_PLACE` = B.`FDELIVERY_PLACE` AND B.FENABLE = '1' AND D.FUNIT_ID = E.FID AND B.FGOODS_ID = D.FID AND A.`FRECEIPT_PLACE` IN (SELECT DISTINCT (FID) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT (B.FID) FROM TSB_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS A, TBD_FREIGHT_ADDRESS B WHERE A.`FADDRESS_ID` = B.FID AND B.FPARENT_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT (B.FID) FROM TSB_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS A, TBD_FREIGHT_ADDRESS B WHERE A.`FADDRESS_ID` = B.FPARENT_ID) A1)

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tsb_cost_analysis_billdetail ( FID, FBILL_ID, FNO, FDELIVERY_PLACE, FRECEIPT_PLACE, FTRANSPORT_TYPE_ID, FSHIPMENT_TYPE_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FUPDATE_TIME, FORG_ID, FACC_ID )
SELECT REPLACE(UUID(), '-', ''), #{billId}, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(FNO),0)+1 from tsb_cost_analysis_billdetail WHERE FBILL_ID ), #{billId}, #{deliveryPlace}, #{receiptPlace}, #{transportTypeId}, #{shipmentTypeId}, #{createTime}, #{creatorId}, #{updateTime}, #{orgId}, #{accId}
mapper.update: update tsb_cost_analysis_billdetail a,tsb_transport_route b, tsb_transport_price c set a.FTRANSPORT_BILL_ID=b.FTRANSPORT_BILL_ID, a.FBILL_DATE=c.FBILL_DATE, a.FFREIGHT_PRICE=c.FAMOUNT, a.FEXPECTED_DAYS=c.FEXPECTED_DAYS, a.FEXECUTE_SIGN=c.FEXECUTE_SIGN where a.FDELIVERY_PLACE=b.FDELIVERY_PLACE and a.FRECEIPT_PLACE=b.FRECEIPT_PLACE and a.FTRANSPORT_TYPE_ID=b.FTRANSPORT_TYPE_ID and a.FSHIPMENT_TYPE_ID=b.FSHIPMENT_TYPE_ID and b.FTRANSPORT_BILL_ID=b.FID and TO_DAYS(a.fcreate_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW())

UPDATE tsb_cost_analysis_bill a SET a.FFREIGHT_PRICE=( SELECT SUM(IFNULL(b.FFREIGHT_PRICE,0)) as FFREIGHT_PRICE FROM tsb_cost_analysis_billdetail b WHERE a.FID=b.FBILL_ID group by b.FBILL_ID
)

UPDATE TSB_COST_ANALYSIS_BILL A INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TSB_COST_ANALYSIS_BILL B WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(FCREATE_TIME) <= 1) B ON B.FROUTE = A.FROUTE AND B.FSUPPLIER_ID = A.FSUPPLIER_ID AND B.FGOODS_ID = A.FGOODS_ID AND A.FGOODS_SPEC_ID = B.FGOODS_SPEC_ID AND A.FGOODS_UINT_ID = B.FGOODS_UINT_ID AND A.FDELIVERY_PLACE = B.FDELIVERY_PLACE AND A.FRECEIPT_PLACE = B.FRECEIPT_PLACE SET a.FPUBLISH_FREIGHT_PRICE = b.FPUBLISH_FREIGHT_PRICE
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM TSB_TRANSPORT_ROUTE a, TSB_PURCHASE_PRICE b WHERE a.`FDELIVERY_PLACE` = b.`FDELIVERY_PLACE` AND B.FENABLE = '1' AND a.`FRECEIPT_PLACE` IN (SELECT DISTINCT (FID) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT (b.FID) FROM tsb_customer_address a, TBD_FREIGHT_ADDRESS b WHERE a.`FADDRESS_ID` = b.FID AND b.FPARENT_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT (b.FID) FROM tsb_customer_address a, TBD_FREIGHT_ADDRESS b WHERE a.`FADDRESS_ID` = b.FPARENT_ID) A1)
